scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Michael the Archangel, clad in ornate golden armor and a red cape, standing on blue clouds. He holds a processional cross aloft and is surrounded by several angels, some with halos and wings, others with hands clasped in prayer. To the right, a winged demon is depicted being weighed on a scale held by Saint Michael, with a small figure in one pan and a larger, darker figure in the other. The background is a golden, textured field, suggesting a celestial or divine setting.
scene_interpretation: The Weighing of Souls / Saint Michael Defeating the Devil
